about.title: About me
about.primary: I’m a software developer with a passion for building efficient, scalable applications. Over the past several years, I’ve honed my skills in C# and SQL, specializing in LINQ queries, backend development, and working with Microsoft Azure components. I thrive in environments where performance and reliability are key, and I enjoy tackling complex problems that require thoughtful architecture and creative solutions.
about.secondary: Beyond writing code, I’m fascinated by how technology can optimize workflows, process large datasets, and create seamless user experiences. I’m constantly learning, experimenting with new tools, and looking for ways to push both my own limits and the limits of the systems I work on.
about.tertiary: When I’m not coding, I enjoy exploring innovative solutions, sharing knowledge with my peers, and staying ahead of trends in the software development landscape.

projects.title: CFOUR Comply
projects.description: In my role on the CFOUR Comply project, I was a key member of the backend development team, responsible for building a robust and event-driven system using C#. I designed and implemented the core backend structure, creating components that supported the application's key functionalities. A central part of my work involved developing an event-driven system that triggered critical XBRL functions in the backend. I specialized in the XBRL functionalities that processed financial data and produced the final, compliant output. My work ensured the accuracy and integrity of the data, which was crucial for the final product. Additionally, I managed and built various Azure components, including Azure Functions and App Services, to support the application's scalability and deployment. This involved ensuring the cloud infrastructure was stable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated with our C# backend.

projects.title: Geo-Mapping Application
projects.description: Contributed to a geo-mapping application of Malta by developing interactive data displays and creating optimized stored procedures to filter, calculate, and aggregate datasets efficiently, integrated Redis caching to manage real-time data and enhance performance, and collaborated with the team to design a modular, scalable architecture while troubleshooting complex data issues and implementing best practices for maintainability and reliability.

projects.title: CFOUR
projects.description: Worked on ETL pipelines for the CFOUR product, connecting with finance APIs to extract and transform data into a MySQL database, and improved and maintained the backend by optimizing queries using LINQ to ensure reliable data integration, handle complex transformations, and maintain performance and accuracy across large financial datasets.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
